mission_data.mission_description: Earth Command wants the Eaton sector cleared of hostiles...without revealing it was their doing.^^Suggested Ship: Pirate (any)^Multi-ship compatible.^Recommended for 2+ ships

disabled_event.name: Initial Command Buttons Variable Set, Player Sides Scrambled

event.name: Sides Fixed Clear all buttons
event.incoming_comms_text: Normal communications have been restored; data sharing has been enabled.^^Good work--now make sure to deploy the remaining relays!

disabled_event.name: MASTER On-Sides Set Comms Buttons Player SLOT
MASTER On-Sides Commands pressed Player SLOT
MASTER On-Sides Comms Menu Player SLOT

event.name: Mission Announce
event.incoming_comms_text: Decryption Complete...^This is Sector Command. ^^The following information is classified as top-secret. This is a black-ops mission.^^You have been provided with captured pirate vessels and forged transponder signals.^^Your instructions are to jump to the Eaton Sector and contact the independent pirate base known as the Hole in the Wall.^^Your goal is to secure the pirate's cooperation in staging the complete annihilation of enemy forces at the hands of "maurading pirates."^^You are authorized to take all actions necessary to secure the pirate's assistance.^^The Long Haul will accompany you to provide limited refit support.^^Should you or any of your crew be captured or killed, Earth will disavow all knowledge of your actions.^^Due to your mission's nature, there will be no further communication.^^Good luck.

event.name: Mission Briefing & Jump to sector Button
event.incoming_comms_text: Current Mission Paramters:^Objective 1: Jump to Eaton Sector.^Objective 2: Rendezvous with the Hole in the Wall and secure cooperation.^Objective 3: Eliminate all enemy forces with extreme prejudice. Leave no survivors.^^Note: No further communication from Command will follow.^^Prepare for system jump.^^BEARING TO EATON SECTOR: 180

set_ship_text.name: O01
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Converted for educational purposes. Carrying a load of Skaraan children.

set_ship_text.name: Farbolt
set_ship_text.scan_desc: All systems offline
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are bringing her back online. Give us a few more moments!

event.name: Mission Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Connection to Sector Command Terminated...

event.name: Hole in the Wall Monster Proofing
Hole in the wall Description
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Rear Admiral Trinh calling in regard to your spaceship's extended warranty.^^I see that it is up for renewal, at a low, low cost.^^Stop by the Hole in the Wall and press accept to redeem!

folder_arme.name: Contacting the Hole in the Wall

event.name: Proximity Test Ship 0
event.incoming_comms_text: Alright, that's close enough.^^We know who you are; whoever did those transponder signals ought to be keelhauled. Besides, your TSN covert scouting mission blundered through here like a bunch of drunken space whales looking for a good time.^^^What do you want?

event.name: Proximity Test Ship 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Alright, that's close enough.^^We know who you are; whoever did those transponder signals ought to be keelhauled. Besides, your TSN covert scouting mission blundered through here like a bunch of drunken space whales looking for a good time.^^^What do you want?

event.name: Response cancelled reset
event.incoming_comms_text: Well? We're waiting.

clear_comms_button.text: We want your help against the Skaraans.
Assist us or die, pirate scum!

set_comms_button.text: We want your help against the Skaraans.
Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Hole in the Wall Destroyed
event.clear_comms_button: Heeeey there...^Looks like your ship went a little, "boom-boom."^^If you're interested in doing some business, we'd be happy to make a trade with you.^^Gen-u-ine TSN equipment.^^Think about it, and drop by when you make up your mind.

Heeeey there...^Looks like your ship went a little, "boom-boom."^^If you're interested in doing some business, we'd be happy to make a trade with you.^^Gen-u-ine TSN equipment.^^Think about it, and drop by when you make up your mind.

event.name: Scam End Artemis On Side
event.clear_comms_button: Your loss.
Your loss.

event.name: Accept Actions Artemis
event.incoming_comms_text: We hope you enjoy your new Warranty.^^Your thrusters have been cleaned, and we have thrown in some tags, torpedoes, and energy.^^We will be sending a pair of fuzzy dice, with a certificate of authenticity, to your home address.^^Thanks for doing business with the Hole in the Wall!

event.set_comms_button: Heeeey there...^Looks like your ship went a little, "boom-boom."^^If you're interested in doing some business, we'd be happy to make a trade with you.^^Gen-u-ine TSN equipment.^^Think about it, and drop by when you make up your mind.

Heeeey there...^Looks like your ship went a little, "boom-boom."^^If you're interested in doing some business, we'd be happy to make a trade with you.^^Gen-u-ine TSN equipment.^^Think about it, and drop by when you make up your mind.

event.name: Exchange Buttons Artemis
event.incoming_comms_text: Press Accept to activate your extended warranty now!^This is a limited time offer!

event.name: Scam End Artemis On Side
event.clear_comms_button: Your loss.
Your loss.

event.name: Accept Actions Artemis
event.incoming_comms_text: We hope you enjoy your new Warranty.^^Your thrusters have been cleaned, and we have thrown in some tags, torpedoes, and energy.^^We will be sending a pair of fuzzy dice, with a certificate of authenticity, to your home address.^^Thanks for doing business with the Hole in the Wall!

event.name: Decline Pressed Artemis
event.incoming_comms_text: Your loss.

event.name: Combat Proving
event.incoming_comms_text: Transfer received, thank you very much.^^We'll let you dock, and use some special scanning tech--but we've got one more test before moving on with our favor.^^There's a rival pirate fleet gathering in the nebula near Sector B2. We'll give you some extra tags to help you out.^
event.set_object_property: Finally finished, have you? Took you long enough.^^Congratulations--it looks like you're competent enough to defeat a handful of purring kittens.^^Unimpressive as that is, maybe you have enough talent aboard to assist us with a pet project.^^We'd like you to...liberate something from the Skaraans.

Finally finished, have you? Took you long enough.^^Congratulations--it looks like you're competent enough to defeat a handful of purring kittens.^^Unimpressive as that is, maybe you have enough talent aboard to assist us with a pet project.^^We'd like you to...liberate something from the Skaraans.

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: EMP and Nuke ask
event.incoming_comms_text: Well, let's see...transfer over all of your EMPs and any nukes you have on board, and then we'll talk about the favor.

set_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Honest Threat

if_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.incoming_comms_text: Seriously?^^Here's a counter-proposal: You die, and we forget this little exchange ever happened.^^Perhaps I'll send your space-bloated corpses back to TSN Intel with a "you're welcome" note. We'll be raising the average IQ of the fleet for them.^^Shark Bait--Look lively and deploy the defense grid!

event.name: Honest Ask 2
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Captain Jack Cross.^I understand that you were openly asking for assistance against the Skaraans. ^^You're clearly fools, and I don't recommend ever heading back to Earth-controlled space.^^That said...I think we can help--if you'll do us a small favor.

set_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Honest Ask
event.incoming_comms_text: Really? How refreshing--some actual honesty.^^I'll ask someone in charge if they're willing to talk to you...but you'd better be willing to part with some rum.

event.name: Honest Threat

if_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.incoming_comms_text: Seriously?^^Here's a counter-proposal: You die, and we forget this little exchange ever happened.^^Perhaps I'll send your space-bloated corpses back to TSN Intel with a "you're welcome" note. We'll be raising the average IQ of the fleet for them.^^Shark Bait--Look lively and deploy the defense grid!

set_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Small Favor Accept
event.incoming_comms_text: Oh, it's nothing compared to what the TSN wants, and is mostly a matter of sentimentality.^^There's something the Skaraans have in their possession which we'd like to see...liberated.

event.name: Pirate Hunt Complete
event.incoming_comms_text: Finally finished, have you? Took you long enough.^^Congratulations--it looks like you're competent enough to defeat a handful of purring kittens.^^Unimpressive as that is, maybe you have enough talent aboard to assist us with a pet project.^^We'd like you to...liberate something from the Skaraans.

Finally finished, have you? Took you long enough.^^Congratulations--it looks like you're competent enough to defeat a handful of purring kittens.^^Unimpressive as that is, maybe you have enough talent aboard to assist us with a pet project.^^We'd like you to...liberate something from the Skaraans.

event.name: Kill Things Accept
event.incoming_comms_text: Interesting offer--for a start.^^Ok. There's an rival pirate fleet gathering in the nebula near Sector B2. We'll let your science officer access our sensor grid for a few minutes and give you some extra tags to help out.^^Go eliminate them for us.^^Take care of that, and we'll consider working with you.

event.name: Sell Things Refusal
event.incoming_comms_text: Do you honestly think we'd trust anything you sent not to explode upon delivery?^^But there is something we would like. It's a small, sentimental token, but one we would like to... "liberate" from the Skaraans, as it were.

event.name: What Pirates want Officer
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Captain Jack Cross.^I understand that you were trying to bribe my Comms officer. This is unacceptable behavior and will not be tolerated: All bribes go through me first.^^We know why you are here. TSN Command wants to eliminate the Skaraan presence in this sector, pin the blame on pirates, and even get our help in the process.^^It's a dirty, cheap move, and one we will happily support...if you do us a small favor.

event.name: What Pirates want comms response
event.incoming_comms_text: Seriously? No one's ever asked me that before...not without being on the pointy end of a torpedo.^^Three kegs of authentic Earth rum, some highly agreeable company, and a printing press for Rigellian tourist visas. In that order.^^Oh...you mean the folks in charge. Of course you do. I'll see if someone wants to talk to you--but I still want the rum.

event.name: Nebula Pierce 5 Uses
event.incoming_comms_text: Activating NEBULA PIERCE will access the Hole in the Wall's sensor grid.^^This will temporarily allow all ship sensors to penetrate the dense nebula in this sector.^^Note that station command has only authorized FIVE uses, each of which will last for only one minute.

event.name: Pierce Ended 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Access to our sensor grid has been disabled.^^Have a nice day!

event.name: Howler Surrender Deny 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Haggis haggis haggis!

event.name: Howler Surrender Deny 1
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Belroc, Captain of the Lone Howler. ^^I have a message for the sodden-witted communications officer who attempted to subvert my crew:^^Your captain has haggis for brains.

event.name: Hole in the Wall Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: That's it; we're out of here. Activate cloaking devices and prepare to jump sector for fallback rendezvous.^^Tell Greybeard he can sell the new scanning systems to the Skaraans.

set_ship_text.name: Lone Howler
set_ship_text.desc: Flagship of the Hole in the Wall Gang.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Heavily upgraded pirate carrier. Numerous shield enhancements and alien technology detected!

set_ship_text.name: Turret 1
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 2
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 3
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 4
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 5
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 6
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also is a shield generator for the ship.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 7
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 8
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 9
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a tractor beam.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 10
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has twin beams on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a point defense system to shoot down torpedoes and mines.

set_ship_text.name: Turret 11
set_ship_text.desc: This turret has a rapid-fire beam on it.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: It also has a drone launcher.

event.name: Threaten Response
event.incoming_comms_text: Seriously?^^Here's a counter-proposal: You die, and we forget this little exchange ever happened.^^Perhaps I'll send your space-bloated corpses back to TSN Intel with a "you're welcome" note. We'll be raising the average IQ of the fleet for them.^^Shark Bait--Look lively and deploy the defense grid!

event.name: Desertion Response
event.incoming_comms_text: Oh, really?^^We don't like people with no sense of honor around here.^^Battle stations everyone! Activate the defense grid and call in the cavalry!

event.name: Recovery Proposal
event.incoming_comms_text: Alright, here's the situation.^^The Skaraans have recently captured a Ximni scout ship, the Farbolt. They were unable to crack the command codes, and have brought her here to scuttle.^^Normally we wouldn't care, but this particular ship belongs to the legendary Ximni Ranger fleet. It is, in fact, Ranger 1, and my chief engineer used to serve onboard the Farbolt. He has demanded that we return her home safely.^^We want you to take a few...specialists...behind Skaraan lines. Find the Farbolt, drop them off, and run interference until they can repair it and return to base. Do that, and we'll help you clear the sector.^^What do you say?

set_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Ximni Threaten

if_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.incoming_comms_text: A pity. You seem like decent fellows; we hate to kill you.^^Inigo--activate the defense grid and call the pack leader!

clear_comms_button.text: Assist us or die, pirate scum!

event.name: Ximni Mission
event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 0
event.incoming_comms_text: You're set to go...Gertrude.^^Great name, by the way.^
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Pillaging Plague you are--wait...that's not...^Ha! Who named your ship, a dentist? ^^Hope you don't get FLOSSED in space with our boarding crew!

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 3
event.incoming_comms_text: Abandoned Barnacle, you are all loaded and we'd be happy to see you shove off.^

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 4
event.incoming_comms_text: Happy Rover, you are primed for departure.^Hope you have earplugs--we gave you the guys who like to play bagpipes before battle.

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 5
event.incoming_comms_text: Let the Wild Rumpus begin! ...Don't get that reference? The state of the education system these days is deplorable.^Fine. Everything is loaded and set to go--so get your illiterate rear engines out of our loading bay.

You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates 6
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates Interrupted 6
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates Complete 7
event.incoming_comms_text: Fearful Minnow, you are all loaded.^Honestly...who named your ships?
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates 7
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Load Pirates Interrupted 7
event.warning_popup_message: Excellent; scholars and gentlemen, you are.^^We'll load the needed repair equipment onto any ship which docks with the Hole in the Wall.^^Once one of you is in proximity to the Farbolt, you'll have to stay nearby for about a minute while transfers are being made.^^Then you'll have to protect the ship until it can return to us.^^We can also scramble the Skaraan sensor system to give you a bit of breathing room, but it'll be limited. You tell us when.

event.name: Farbolt Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: The Farbolt has been destroyed...thanks to your ineptitude.^^We are vacating the system, and have sent your location to a rival pirate fleet.^^Have a nice day.

event.name: Station Proximity Ship0
event.incoming_comms_text: All ships! We have pirates on the radar! Repeat, pirates on radar!

event.name: Jump to Station
event.incoming_comms_text: Ah...Very nice. An actual Ximni Ranger. Thank you for delivering her safely; we have plans for this beauty.^^Now, as for our promise to help... We changed our minds. We're pirates, after all.^^But don't worry; we sent an...invitation...on your behalf. The recipients will be arriving soon, and hopping mad. They should be quite convincing as an attack fleet. ^^Also, we've elected to leave a handful of automated ships to help you with scanning, so don't say we never did anything for you.^^Mr. Kim--inform the fleet we are moving out, and engage the station's jump drive.

event.name: Jump to Station Hole in Wall destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: So...you managed to recover the Ranger.^^Too bad for you that it came at the cost of our home.^^We sent an...invitation...on your behalf. The recipients will be arriving soon. Have fun.^^Mr. Wilson--inform the fleet we are moving out.

event.name: Hole in the Wall Exit
event.incoming_comms_text: One last word of advice:^^Don't let either of our capital ships be destroyed or you'll probably regret it.

event.name: Hole in the Wall Exit
event.incoming_comms_text: One last word of advice:^^Don't go home, or you'll probably regret it.

event.name: Nebula Blocks Sensors Unicorn
event.incoming_comms_text: The Vulgar Unicorn has been destroyed! Without them we can't pierce the nebula for you.^^Repeat--nebulas are now blocking sensors!

event.name: Nebula Blocks Sensors Last Rites
event.incoming_comms_text: The Last Rites has been destroyed! Without them we can't pierce the nebula for you.^^Repeat--nebulas are now blocking sensors!

event.name: Enemy Pirates Arrive
event.incoming_comms_text: You nut-shelling, navel-lint-eating, lazy-eyed excuses for pirates are going to regret your insolence!^^No one insults my mother!

event.name: Base 1 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: Base 2 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: Base 3 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: Base 4 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: Base 5 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: Base 6 Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--destroy the Pirate vessels!

event.name: School Ship Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: All hands--seek and destroy the Pirate vessels!^They are attacking civilians and children!

event.name: Denoument Start
event.incoming_comms_text: Mission complete.^Return to base for debriefing.

event.name: Mission Failed
event.incoming_comms_text: Surviving witnesses have identified you as responsible for war crimes in the Eaton sector. ^^You are hereby banished from Terran space.

event.name: System Recreated
event.incoming_comms_text: All ships, destroy the pirate vessels!

event.name: Jump to Sector Pressed
event.incoming_comms_text: To all vessels in the Eaton System:^^The USN now claims this sector as a protectorate.^^Any Pirate ships in Earth-controlled space will be destroyed on sight.

event.name: USN Fleet Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: We will hunt you down.

event.name: End Pressed
event.incoming_comms_text: To all Pirate vessels in the Eaton system:^^The USN has now claimed this sector as a protectorate.^^If you enter or are found in Earth-controlled space again, you will be destroyed on sight.
